item.title: First post!
item.description: This is my first post with hugo. Thanks to hugo, hyde-hyde and github pages. changelog 2018/08/16 Add some hugo command notes hugo commands hugo new posts/hugo_notes.md This command will generate a new article based on archetypes/default.md hugo server start a local http server, helpful to preview the results before push. hugo generate a static site contents into public folder based your current configuration.

item.title: My first debian conf :)
item.description: I was so lucky to be able to attend this summer and helping the video team to accomplish some tasks! what is debian conf DebConf is the Debian Project’s developer conference. Where Debian developers(DDs) came from everywhere. I wish I could contribute more and be more involved into the debian community next year in Brazil.
